mdRecord.dcterms:description: Comments on military situation in Charleston and Chattanooga. Comments on life in camp: review of brigade by Richard Ewell; mock battle; mock review; revival.
There are three files available: a PDF transcription, a plain text transcription, and a PDF which was created from scans of the original document.
